main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Charleston, West Virginia on July 20 or 21, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a small teardrop tail and the size of a basketball,It emitted a bright light similar to white heat,The observation lasted 10-15 seconds,The object was seen to stop, start, and change course,The airport was located 3-5 miles from the sighting.
sighted object: one round object with a small teardrop tail
